-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    sum(Cost), Location
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2020/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY [Location]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    sum(Cost), Location
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
where (Cost > 1000.00)
GROUP BY [Location]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType,
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date],
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    sum(Cost) as Cost,
    MeterSubCategory
    --*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and MeterSubCategory != 'Reservation-Base VM'
--and (MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Windows%') 
--WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ConsumedService = 'Microsoft.MachineLearningServices' and MeterName = 'Compute' and AdditionalInfo NOT LIKE '%Standard_DS[0-9]_v2%'
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterSubCategory
--GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType')
--GROUP BY REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING(AdditionalInfo,CHARINDEX('Standard_',AdditionalInfo)+11,2),'_',''),'s','')
ORDER BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), ServiceType

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    sum(Cost)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/*/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
where ([result].[Date] BETWEEN '2021-04-01' and '2022-03-31')

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    sum(Cost) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as Date,
    Product, 
    MeterCategory, 
    MeterSubCategory, 
    ConsumedService, 
    MeterName, 
    UnitOfMeasure, 
    PartNumber, 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity, 
    sum(Cost) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), Product, MeterCategory, MeterSubCategory, ConsumedService, MeterName, UnitOfMeasure, PartNumber
ORDER BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterCategory

--
--   Cost by MeterCategory
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    --CostAllocationCode
    ActiveWBS
    ,MeterCategory
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/benchmark/AmortizedCost/CostTagsExtended_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_2022*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS, MeterCategory --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), CostAllocationType,
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType

--
--   Cost by MeterCategory
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    ActiveWBS
    ,MeterCategory
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/benchmark/Ac*/CostTagsExtended_ACMMonthly*2022*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS, MeterCategory --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), CostAllocationType,
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType

--
--   Cost by ConsumedService
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    --CostAllocationCode
    ActiveWBS
    ,ConsumedService
    --,MeterCategory
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/benchmark/AmortizedCost/CostTagsExtended_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_2022*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS, ConsumedService --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), CostAllocationType,
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType

--
--   Cost by ConsumedService
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    ActiveWBS
    ,ConsumedService
    --,MeterCategory
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/benchmark/ActualCost/CostTagsExtended_ACMMonthlyActualCost_2022*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS, ConsumedService --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), CostAllocationType,
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType

--
--   Cost by WBS to be charged (including CI and APPID WBS lookup)
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    ActiveWBS
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    --,format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N2') as Cost
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/benchmark/AmortizedCost/CostTagsExtended_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_2022*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS--, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) DESC--, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType DESC

--
--   Cost by WBS to be charged (including CI and APPID WBS lookup)
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    ActiveWBS
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    --,format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N2') as Cost
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/benchmark/ActualCost/CostTagsExtended_ACMMonthlyActualCost_2022*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS--, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) DESC--, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType DESC

--
--   Cost by Resource Location
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    --CostAllocationCode
    ActiveWBS
    ,ResourceLocation
    --,MeterCategory
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/benchmark/AmortizedCost/CostTagsExtended_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_2022*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS, ResourceLocation --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), CostAllocationType,
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType

--
--   Cost by ConsumedService
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    ActiveWBS
    ,ResourceLocation
    --,MeterCategory
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/benchmark/ActualCost/CostTagsExtended_ACMMonthlyActualCost_2022*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS, ResourceLocation --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), CostAllocationType,
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/benchmark/ActualCost/CostTagsExtended_ACMMonthlyActualCost_2022*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where upper(Tags) not like '%"COSTALLOCATIONTYPE": "CI%' and 
          upper(Tags) not like '%"COSTALLOCATIONTYPE": "WBS%' AND
          upper(Tags) not like '%"COSTALLOCATIONTYPE": "APPID%' AND
          upper(Tags) not like '%"COSTALLOCATIONTYPE": "TOBESPECIFIED%' AND
          upper(Tags) not like '%"COSTALLOCATIONTYPE": ""%' AND
          upper(Tags) not like '%"COSTALLOCATIONTYPE": " "%' AND
          upper(Tags) like '%"COSTALLOCATIONTYPE"%'

properties.description: Based on the new data that is generated by Joakim.

content.query:
USE costmgmt
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW BusinessAreaLevel
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/AzureAD_BusinessAreaLevel/gold/usersWithBusinessAreaSnapshot_v1.parquet/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

-- Create the Calendar table
CREATE TABLE Calendar (
    [Date] DATE PRIMARY KEY,
    [Year] INT,
    [Month] INT,
    [Day] INT,
    [Quarter] INT,
    [DayOfWeek] INT,
    [Weekday] BIT,
    [WeekOfYear] INT,
    [MonthName] NVARCHAR(20),
    [DayName] NVARCHAR(20),
    [IsHoliday] BIT
);

-- Populate the Calendar table
DECLARE @StartDate DATE = '2000-01-01';
DECLARE @EndDate DATE = '2030-12-31';

WITH CalendarData AS (
    SELECT
        DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate) AS [Date],
        DATEPART(YEAR, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [Year],
        DATEPART(MONTH, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [Month],
        DATEPART(DAY, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [Day],
        DATEPART(QUARTER, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [Quarter],
        DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [DayOfWeek],
        CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) IN (1, 7) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS [Weekday],
        DATEPART(WEEK, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [WeekOfYear],
        DATENAME(MONTH, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [MonthName],
        DATENAME(WEEKDAY, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [DayName],
        0 AS [IsHoliday] -- Set IsHoliday value based on your specific requirements
    FROM sys.all_columns AS c1
    CROSS JOIN sys.all_columns AS c2
    WHERE DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate) <= @EndDate
)

INSERT INTO Calendar ([Date], [Year], [Month], [Day], [Quarter], [DayOfWeek], [Weekday], [WeekOfYear], [MonthName], [DayName], [IsHoliday])
SELECT [Date], [Year], [Month], [Day], [Quarter], [DayOfWeek], [Weekday], [WeekOfYear], [MonthName], [DayName], [IsHoliday]
FROM CalendarData;

USE costmgmt
GO

        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'

USE costmgmt

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW tsc_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_Aggregated_overview
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/aggregate/parquet/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_Aggregated_overview.parquet/*.parquet',

AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/aggregate/parquet/Extended_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_overview_Threeyears.parquet/*/*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

declare @last_month varchar(6) = FORMAT(EOMONTH(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, -1), 'yyyyMM'),
        @sql varchar(max) = ''

set @sql = '
SELECT
    SubscriptionId, 
    SubscriptionName,
    [Date],
    ResourceGroup, 
    ResourceName, 
    ResourceId, 
    MeterCategory, 
    MeterSubCategory, 
    MeterName,
    UnitOfMeasure,
    Quantity,
    UnitPrice,
    EffectivePrice,
    CostInBillingCurrency,
    ServiceInfo2, 
    PartNumber,
    AdditionalInfo
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/' + @last_month + '*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]
WHERE ([Date] >= ''2023-01-30'' and [Date] <= ''2023-02-01'') 
    and (ResourceId like ''%/virtualMachines/%'' or ResourceId like ''%/virtualMachineScaleSets/%'')
    and (MeterSubCategory like ''%Windows%'' or ServiceInfo2 = ''Windows Server BYOL'')

UNION --ALL

SELECT
    SubscriptionId, 
    SubscriptionName,
    [Date],
    ResourceGroup, 
    ResourceName, 
    ResourceId, 
    MeterCategory, 
    MeterSubCategory, 
    MeterName,
    UnitOfMeasure,
    Quantity,
    UnitPrice,
    EffectivePrice,
    CostInBillingCurrency,
    ServiceInfo2, 
    PartNumber,
    AdditionalInfo
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/ACMDailyActualCost.parquet'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]
WHERE ([Date] >= ''2023-01-30'' and [Date] <= ''2023-02-01'') 
    and (ResourceId like ''%/virtualMachines/%'' or ResourceId like ''%/virtualMachineScaleSets/%'')
    and (MeterSubCategory like ''%Windows%'' or ServiceInfo2 = ''Windows Server BYOL'')
'

EXECUTE(@sql)

SELECT
    SubscriptionName, sum(Cost) as Cost, ConsumedService --, substring([Date],0,8) as [Date]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/monthly/2021/*/*-cleaned.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where substring([Date],0,8) = '2021-01'
GROUP BY SubscriptionName, ConsumedService, substring([Date],0,8)
ORDER BY SubscriptionName, ConsumedService, substring([Date],0,8)

SELECT
    format([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,MeterCategory
    ,SubscriptionName
    ,MeterName
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2023*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'Azure Databricks'
    GROUP by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), MeterName, MeterCategory, SubscriptionName --MeterName, 
    order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), sum(CostInBillingCurrency) DESC

    format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,UnitOfMeasure
    ,UnitPrice
    ,MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,MeterName
    
    ,ResourceId
    --distinct(MeterName)

    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/202308*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

    group by ResourceId
    ,UnitOfMeasure

    ,MeterCategory

    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores') as ai_vCores,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.UsageType') as ai_UsageType,

    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ConsumedQuantity') as ai_ConsumedQuantity,

    )

declare @HUB_Date as varchar(10)
set @HUB_Date = '2023-01-21'
SELECT
    --TOP 10  *
    count(ResourceName)
    --ResourceName
    --,substring(cast([Date] as varchar),1,10) as [Date]
    --,MeterCategory
    --,MeterName
    --,AVG(cast(JSON_VALUE (AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as int)) as vCPUs
    --,ResourceId
    --sum(cast(JSON_VALUE (AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as int)) as vCPU
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/20230101-20230131/ACMDailyActualCost_653a874b-ede7-4670-abf7-fde225a5544f.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where ServiceInfo2 = 'Windows Server BYOL' and substring(cast([Date] as varchar),1,10) = @HUB_Date
    group by ResourceId, ResourceName ,substring(cast([Date] as varchar),1,10) ,MeterCategory, MeterName

    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') as AHB, 
    MeterSubCategory,
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date], 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    PartNumber,
    Product,
    InstanceId
    --TOP 1000 *

    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2022/06/*_cleaned.csv',

ORDER BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), ConsumedQuantity DESC

    Product

SELECT

    substring([Date],0,8) as [Date],

    Product,

    MeterCategory

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/monthly/2022/*/*-cleaned.parquet',

    ) AS [result]

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --top 100 *
    --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    upper(ConsumedService) as ConsumedService
    ,upper(MeterCategory) as [MeterCategory]
    ,FORMAT(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/2023*/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_2023*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where ConsumedService is not null --and MeterCategory like '%SQL%'
    group BY upper(ConsumedService), upper(MeterCategory)
    order by upper(ConsumedService), upper(MeterCategory)

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(additionalInfo, '$.UsageType') as UsageType,
    JSON_VALUE(additionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType,
    JSON_VALUE(additionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as VCPUs,
    substring(FORMAT (usageStartDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,8) AS [Date],
    sum(consumedQuantity) as consumedQuantity,
    sum(resourceRate) as resourceRate,
    sum(extendedCost) as extendedCost,
    isRecurringCharge
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/annual/2021/Marketplace_Charges_2021.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(additionalInfo, '$.UsageType'),
    JSON_VALUE(additionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'),
    substring(FORMAT (usageStartDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,8),
    JSON_VALUE(additionalInfo, '$.VCPUs'),
    isRecurringCharge
    order by extendedCost DESC

FROM

where PublisherType = 'Marketplace'

    *

    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyAmortizedCost/20221101-20221130/ACMDailyAmortizedCost_c2efb564-3599-4f9d-a5a8-800a769844e3.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',

    --,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    --,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost

    OPENROWSET(

USE costmgmt

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW tsc_MonthlyPartitioned
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/aggregate/parquet/MonthlyPartitioned.parquet/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
SubscriptionName
,[ResourceGroup]
,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
--,concat(substring([Date],7,4), '-', substring([Date],1,2)) as [Date]
--,substring([Date],0,8) as [Date]
--,sum([Cost]) as Cost
--,SUM(Quantity) as Quantity
,ai_ServiceType
,[MeterCategory]
,[MeterSubCategory]
,Tags
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        --BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/daily/*-cleaned.parquet',
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/202212*/E*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where 
    --UPPER(Tags) like '%C.ITX.036.001%' --OR
    UPPER(Tags) like '%C.ITX.036.002%' --OR
    --UPPER(Tags) like '%C.ITD.15.022%' OR
    --UPPER(Tags) like '%C.ITD.15.034%' OR
    --UPPER(Tags) like '%C.ITX.43.001%' OR
    --UPPER(Tags) like '%C.ITX.46.004%' OR
    --UPPER(Tags) like '%C.ITX.46.007%' OR
    --UPPER(Tags) like '%C.ITX.46.011%' OR
    --UPPER(Tags) like '%C.ITX.46.012%' OR
    --UPPER(Tags) like '%C.ITX.036.002%'
--GROUP BY [MeterCategory], ResourceGroup, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), SubscriptionName, MeterSubCategory, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationId'), substring([Date],0,8)
--ORDER BY substring([Date],0,8) DESC, sum(ConsumedQuantity) DESC

SELECT
    --TOP 100 *
    SubscriptionName
    --,ResourceGroup
    --,ResourceName
    --,SUBSTRING(CAST([Date] as VARCHAR),1,10) as [Date]
    ,ProductName
    ,MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,ResourceLocation
    ,UnitOfMeasure
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,round(AVG(UnitPrice),2) as UnitPrice
    ,ROUND(sum(CostInBillingCurrency),2) as Cost
    ,PartNumber
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/20230801-20230831/Extended_ACMMonthlyActualCost_20230801-20230831.parquet/part-*.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where 
    lower(SubscriptionName) in (
        'hub01-shared-services'
        ,'s268-prod-geology-geophysics'
        ,'s034-geology-geophysics')
    and MeterCategory in (
        'Virtual Network'
        --,'ExpressRoute'
        --,'Bandwidth' 
        )
    and [Date] > '2023-08-06' and [Date] < '2023-08-12'
    and ResourceLocation = 'westeurope'
    and MeterSubCategory <> 'IP Addresses'
    group by SubscriptionName, ProductName, PartNumber, MeterCategory, MeterSubCategory, ResourceLocation, UnitOfMeasure ,PartNumber --, SUBSTRING(CAST([Date] as VARCHAR),1,10), ResourceGroup ,ResourceName,

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    COUNT(DISTINCT [ResourceLocation])
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/*/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE

where ([result].[Date] BETWEEN '2021-04-01' and '2022-03-31')

-- This is auto-generated code

    ) AS [result]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    DISTINCT [ResourceLocation]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/*/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
where ([result].[Date] BETWEEN '2021-04-01' and '2022-03-31')

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    DISTINCT [ResourceLocation]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
ORDER BY [ResourceLocation]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
--top 100
    ServiceInfo2 as [Image Type]
    --,count(DISTINCT ResourceId) as [Count]
    ,ResourceId
    --,FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    --,SubscriptionId
    --,SubscriptionName
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,Tags
    --,PricingModel
    --,*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/202201*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and Tags not like '%"Cluster%' and Tags not like '%"Kubernetes%' and ServiceInfo2 is NULL --and SubscriptionId = '019958ea-fe2c-4e14-bbd9-0d2db8ed7cfc'
    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/019958ea-fe2c-4e14-bbd9-0d2db8ed7cfc/resourceGroups/MC_AURORA11_AURORA11_NORTHEUROPE/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets/aks-gpu-36545846-vmss'
    --group by ServiceInfo2 --, FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM'), 
    --order by count(DISTINCT ResourceId) DESC

declare @thirtydaysago datetime
declare @now datetime
set @now = getdate()
set @thirtydaysago = dateadd(day,-30,@now)

    SELECT
        format([Date],'yyyy-MM-dd') as [Date]
        ,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
        ,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as vCPUs
        --,AVG(cast(JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as INT)) as vCPUs
        ,ProductName
        ,ResourceLocation
        ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
        ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as [PAYG Cost]
        --,Quantity
        ,benefitName
        --,*
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/20230101-20230131/ACMMonthlyActualCost_20230101-20230131.parquet',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
        ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and benefitName is null and [Date] >= @thirtydaysago and MeterName not like 'A%'
    group by [Date], JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs'), ProductName, ResourceLocation, benefitName

    UNION

    SELECT
        format([Date],'yyyy-MM-dd') as [Date]
        ,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
        ,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as vCPUs
        --,AVG(cast(JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as INT)) as vCPUs
        ,ProductName
        ,ResourceLocation
        ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
        ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as [PAYG Cost]
        --,Quantity
        ,benefitName
        --,*
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/ACMDailyActualCost.parquet',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
        ) AS [result2]   
    where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and benefitName is null and [Date] >= @thirtydaysago and MeterName not like 'A%'
    group by [Date], JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs'), ProductName, ResourceLocation, benefitName
order by [Date]

SELECT
    --*
    --SubscriptionName
    --,ResourceGroup
    --ProductName
    MeterSubCategory
    ,ResourceLocation
    ,MeterName
    ,UnitPrice
    --,ProductName
    --,ResourceName
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/202304*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        --BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/ACMDailyActualCost.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where 
        (SubscriptionName = 'S009-Desktop-Service TS1' 
        or SubscriptionName = 'S220-Desktop-Service TS2')
        and ProductName like '%SSD Managed Disks%'
    group by UnitPrice, MeterSubCategory, MeterName, ResourceLocation--, ResourceName, ResourceGroup, ProductName, ProductName, SubscriptionName
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) DESC

USE costmgmt
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW Pricesheets_New
AS


SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/pricesheet/New/ArmPriceSheet_Enrollment_LATEST.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
[ResourceGroup]
--,substring([Date],0,8) as [Date]
--,sum([Cost]) as Cost
,SUM(ConsumedQuantity) as Quantity
,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationId') as ReservationId
,[MeterCategory]
,[MeterSubCategory]
,[SubscriptionName]
,substring([Date],0,8) as [Date]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        --BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/daily/*-cleaned.parquet',
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/monthly/2022/*/*-cleaned.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where SubscriptionName = 'S138-SAP-Solution-Landscape' AND
    UPPER(ResourceGroup) IN 
        ('S138-WESB-RG-S02', 'S138-WEDV-RG-D02', 'S138-WEQA-RG-SOX-Q02', 'S138-WEPR-RG-SOX-P02', 
        'S138-WESB-RG-S63', 'S138-WESB-RG-SB3', 'S138-WESB-RG-S83', 'S138-WESB-RG-S12', 
        'S138-WESB-RG-S73', 'S138-WESB-RG-Q73', 'S138-WESB-RG-T73', 'S138-WESB-RG-S43', 'S138-WESB-RG-SOX-S09',

        'S138-WEQA-RG-SOX-Q33', 'S138-WESB-RG-SX3', 'S138-WEDV-RG-DX3', 'S138-WEQA-RG-QX3', 'S138-WEPR-RG-SOX-PX3')

USE costmgmt
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW RI_VM_Savings
AS

SELECT
    *

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/savings/monthly/*/*/*-RI-VM.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    jsonContent,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.armSkuName') AS armSkuName,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.term') AS term,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.region') AS region,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.eventDate') AS eventDate,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.reservationOrderId') AS reservationOrderId,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.description') AS [description],
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.quantity') AS quantity,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.amount') AS amount,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.reservationOrderName') AS reservationOrderName,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.billingFrequency') AS billingFrequency
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2022/*/costreport_reservations_monthly_*.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '`',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '},'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent nvarchar(MAX),
        armSkuName varchar(MAX),
        term varchar(MAX),
        region varchar(MAX),
        eventDate varchar(MAX),
        reservationOrderId nvarchar(MAX),
        [description] varchar(MAX),
        quantity varchar(MAX),
        amount varchar(MAX),
        reservationOrderName varchar(MAX),
        billingFrequency varchar(MAX)
    )
    AS [result]
    --where armSkuName NOT LIKE 'SQL%'
    --where reservationOrderId = '7334aae9-5adc-4e4c-a58b-801d095a14df'
    order by eventDate

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    armSkuName AS armSkuName,
    term AS term,
    region AS region,
    substring(FORMAT (eventDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,11) AS eventDate,
    reservationOrderId AS reservationOrderId,
    description AS [description],
    quantity AS quantity,
    amount AS amount,
    reservationOrderName AS reservationOrderName,
    billingFrequency AS billingFrequency
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/annual/2021/reservation_cost.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where reservationOrderId = '7334aae9-5adc-4e4c-a58b-801d095a14df'
order by substring(FORMAT (eventDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,11)

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT TOP 100
    jsonContent,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skuName') AS skuName,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.reservationId') AS reservationId,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.usageDate') AS usageDate,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.totalReservedQuantity') AS totalReservedQuantity,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.reservedHours') AS reservedHours,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.usedHours') AS usedHours
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/validation/2022/02/02/costreport_reservation_details_validation.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '\',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '},'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent nvarchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result]

[ResourceName]
,[ServiceInfo2]
,[Date]
,[MeterCategory]
,[MeterSubCategory]
,[Quantity]
,[EffectivePrice]
,[CostInBillingCurrency]
,[UnitPrice]
,[SubscriptionId]
,[SubscriptionName]
,[ResourceGroup]
,[PublisherType]
,[PublisherName]
,[ReservationId]
,[ReservationName]
,[ResourceId]
,[AdditionalInfo]
,[MeterName]
,[MeterRegion]
,[UnitOfMeasure]
,[ResourceLocation]
,[ProductName]
,[MeterId]
 FROM [dbo].[Combined_Actual_Savings]
where upper(ResourceName) in ('CVD-240002', 'CVD-240003', 'CVD-240007', 'CVD-240008', 'CVD-240013', 
                        'CVD-240022', 'CVD-240026', 'CVD-240029', 'CVD-240030', 'CVD-240032', 
                        'CVD-240033', 'CVD-240037', 'CVD-240039', 'CVD-240040', 'CVD-240042',

        and [Date] >= '2023-01-28' and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines'

ResourceName
,ResourceId
,Tags
,SubscriptionName
,[Date]
FROM [dbo].[Combined_Actual_Savings]
where upper(ResourceName) in (--'MMP-TS4401', 'MMP-TS4402',
                        'MMP-TS4302', 'MMP-TS4301') 
        --and [Date] >= '2023-01-01' 
        and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines'
--group by ResourceName,ResourceId,Tags, SubscriptionName

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    SubscriptionName,
    ResourceName,
    ResourceGroup,
    [Date] as Date,
    substring([Date],7,4) + '-' + substring([Date],1,2) + '-' + substring([Date],4,2)  as FormattedDate,
    substring([Date],7,4) + '-' + substring([Date],1,2) as [ShortDate],
    ResourceLocation,
    UnitOfMeasure,
    Quantity,
    CostInBillingCurrency,
    EffectivePrice,
    UnitPrice,
    PayGPrice,    
    ProductName,
    MeterCategory,
    MeterSubCategory,
    MeterName,   
    ServiceInfo1,
    ServiceInfo2,
    ReservationId,
    ReservationName,     
    PartNumber,
    PlanName,
    Term,
    CostCenter,
    ConsumedService,
    ResourceId,
    Tags,
    OfferId,
    AdditionalInfo,
    PublisherType,
    PublisherName,
    ChargeType,
    Frequency,
    PricingModel,
    ServiceFamily,
    benefitId,
    benefitName,
    SubscriptionId

        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/2022*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where SubscriptionName = 'S009-Desktop-Service TS1' or SubscriptionName = 'S220-Desktop-Service TS2' and substring([Date],7,4) + '-' + substring([Date],1,2) >= '2022-05'
        and substring([Date],7,4) + '-' + substring([Date],1,2) <= '2022-08'
--order by FormattedDate

    --count(SubscriptionName)

    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2022*/*.parquet',

    ) AS [result]

    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as VCPUs,
    substring([Date],7,4) + '-' + substring([Date],1,2) + '-' + substring([Date],4,2) as [Date],
    PartNumber,
    UnitOfMeasure,
    ProductName,
    MeterCategory,

    --count(SubscriptionName)

        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where SubscriptionName = 'S034-Geology-Geophysics' and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE '%BYOL' --and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
--group by JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs'),

    ) AS [result]

--WHERE MeterCategory LIKE 'SQL%'

-----Due to MS bug where SQL DB's with HUB applied are identified as SQL MI DB's we are only querying for SQL MI and SQL VM below. If MS fix the bug the correct query for SQL DB with HUB will need to be identified and added to the where section of the query

WHERE (MeterCategory = 'SQL Managed Instance' and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'True') or (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Hybrid%') 

-----Below line extracts non HUB SQL entries for testing & investigation purposes

GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring([Date],0,8), MeterSubCategory, PartNumber, Product, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB'), InstanceId, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores'), MeterCategory, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs')
ORDER BY substring([Date],0,8), ConsumedQuantity DESC

SELECT

--WHERE ServiceInfo2 NOT LIKE 'Windows%' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE '%BYOL' and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
--WHERE (MeterCategory = 'SQL Managed Instance' and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'True') or (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Hybrid%')
--WHERE InstanceId = '/subscriptions/f9892073-3b09-40b7-8f33-1e0320e683c8/resourceGroups/rg-echomodeldist-test/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sql-echomodeldist-test/databases/sql-echomodeldist-test/sqldb-echomodeldist-test'
--WHERE ResourceGroup = 'equr-ep-dev-cmn-01'

-- This is auto-generated code

SELECT

    ,format([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    --,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
    ,avg(UnitPrice) as UnitPrice
    --,EffectivePrice as EffectivePrice
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,sum(UnitPrice * Quantity) as [PAYG Cost]
    ,sum(EffectivePrice * Quantity) as [RI Cost]
    ,sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as TotalUsedSavings
    
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAm*/2022*/A*.parquet',

    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,sum(UnitPrice * Quantity) as [PAYG Cost]
    ,sum(EffectivePrice * Quantity) as [RI Cost]
    ,sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as TotalUsedSavings
    
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAm*/2022*/A*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'

group by ReservationName, format([Date],'yyyy-MM')
order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), ReservationName

content.query:
declare @thirtydaysago datetime
declare @now datetime
set @now = getdate()
set @thirtydaysago = dateadd(day,-30,@now)

SELECT
    format([Date],'yyyy-MM-dd') as [Date]
    ,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
    ,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as vCPUs
    --,AVG(cast(JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as INT)) as vCPUs
    ,ProductName
    ,MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    --,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    --,sum(Quantity) * AVG(cast(JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as INT)) as [Normalised Quantity]
    ,Quantity
    ,benefitName
    ,*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/20230101-20230131/ACMMonthlyActualCost_20230101-20230131.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and benefitName is null and [Date] >= @thirtydaysago and MeterName not like 'A%'
--group by [Date], JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs'), ProductName, benefitName
order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM-dd')

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    SubscriptionName
    ,ResourceGroup
    ,ResourceLocation
    ,[Date]
    ,MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,MeterName
    ,UnitOfMeasure
    ,ChargeType
    ,PricingModel
    ,benefitName
    ,Quantity
    ,EffectivePrice
    ,UnitPrice
    ,CostInBillingCurrency
    ,PayGPrice
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyAmortizedCost/20221101-20221130/ACMDailyAmortizedCost_c2efb564-3599-4f9d-a5a8-800a769844e3.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
where ChargeType = 'Usage' and PricingModel = 'SavingsPlan'
order by [Date] DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    SubscriptionName
    ,ResourceGroup
    ,ResourceLocation
    ,[Date]
    ,MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,MeterName
    ,UnitOfMeasure
    ,ChargeType
    ,PricingModel
    ,benefitName
    ,Quantity
    ,EffectivePrice
    ,UnitPrice
    ,Quantity * UnitPrice as PAYG_Cost
    ,Quantity * EffectivePrice as SP_Amount_Consumed
    ,(Quantity * UnitPrice) - (Quantity * EffectivePrice) as Saving
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyAmortizedCost/20221101-20221130/ACMDailyAmortizedCost_c2efb564-3599-4f9d-a5a8-800a769844e3.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
where ChargeType = 'Usage' and PricingModel = 'SavingsPlan'
order by [Date] DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/20221101-20221130/ACMDailyActualCost_364ce664-c75b-437f-83c4-c74d393e6da3.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
where PricingModel = 'SavingsPlan' and ChargeType = 'Purchase' --and SubscriptionName = 'S037-Cost-Management-reservations'

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyAmortizedCost/20221101-20221130/ACMDailyAmortizedCost_c2efb564-3599-4f9d-a5a8-800a769844e3.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
--where [Date] = '11/02/2022'
where PricingModel = 'SavingsPlan' and ChargeType = 'UnusedSavingsPlan' --and SubscriptionName = 'S037-Cost-Management-reservations'
order by [Date]

SELECT TOP (100) [ResourceName]
,[MeterCategory]
,[ServiceFamily]

,[PricingModel]
,[PayGPrice]

 FROM [dbo].[tsc_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_overview_Oneyear]

content.query:
SELECT
    --*
    --SubscriptionName
    --,ResourceGroup
    --ProductName
    MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    --,ResourceLocation
    --,MeterName
    --,ProductName
    --,UnitPrice
    --,ProductName
    --,ResourceName
    --,UnitOfMeasure
    --,format(sum(Quantity), 'N', 'en-us') as Quantity
    ,format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/2023*/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_2023*.parquet',
        --BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/ACMDailyActualCost.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where 
        ProductName like '%SSD Managed Disks%'
        and MeterName like '%Disk%'
        and MeterName <> 'Disk Operations'
    group by MeterCategory, MeterSubCategory--, UnitOfMeasure--, ProductName --MeterName --, ResourceLocation--, ResourceName, ResourceGroup, ProductName, ProductName, SubscriptionName, UnitPrice,
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) DESC

SELECT
    --TOP 100 *
    ResourceName
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM-dd') as [Date]
    ,MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,MeterName
    ,UnitOfMeasure
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,UnitPrice
    ,EffectivePrice
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as CostInBillingCurrency
    ,PartNumber
    ,PlanName
    ,ResourceLocation
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/20230301-20230331/ACMMonthlyActualCost_20230301-20230331.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where SubscriptionId = '66638e28-3650-4b8c-a097-c0945a79fd90' 
        and MeterCategory = 'Storage'
        and ResourceName = 'asdashared'
        and MeterSubCategory = 'Tiered Block Blob'
        and MeterName like '%Data Stored'
    group by 
        ResourceName
        --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM-dd')
        ,MeterCategory
        ,MeterSubCategory
        ,MeterName
        ,UnitOfMeasure
        --,Quantity
        ,UnitPrice
        ,EffectivePrice
        --,CostInBillingCurrency
        ,PartNumber
        ,PlanName
        ,ResourceLocation

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    MeterCategory,
    MeterName,
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date],
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    sum(Cost) as Cost,
    UnitOfMeasure
    --*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Azure Data Share' or 
    MeterCategory = 'Azure NetApp Files' OR
    MeterCategory = 'Backup' OR
    MeterCategory = 'Storage' OR
    MeterCategory = 'StorSimple'
GROUP BY MeterCategory, MeterName, substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), UnitOfMeasure
ORDER BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterCategory

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date],
    Redundancy,
    sum(StorageInGb) as StorageInGb
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniadlseun.dfs.core.windows.net/dls/enterprise/data/IT-Asset/InformationAssets/OmniaFacts/Dataset/AcdcDataset/AzureStorageAccountSizeByRedundancy/2022/03/AzureStorageSizeByRedundancy/part-00000-ecca91e8-c471-4ee4-ad71-8e0ba8d5c669-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) LIKE '2021%'
GROUP by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), Redundancy
order by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8)

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    sum(Cost)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/*/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE 
    [result].[MeterCategory] = 'Storage' AND
    [result].[MeterSubCategory] NOT LIKE '%Bandwidth%' AND
    ([result].[Date] BETWEEN '2021-04-01' and '2022-03-31')

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    sum(Cost)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE 
    [result].[MeterCategory] = 'Storage' and 
    [result].[MeterSubCategory] NOT LIKE '%Bandwidth%'

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    sum(Cost), [MeterSubCategory]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/*/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE   
    [result].[MeterCategory] = 'Storage' and 
    [result].[MeterSubCategory] NOT LIKE '%Bandwidth%' and 
    ([result].[Date] BETWEEN '2021-04-01' and '2022-03-31')
GROUP by [MeterSubCategory]
ORDER by sum(Cost) DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date],
    [MeterSubCategory], 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    UnitOfMeasure,
    sum(Cost) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Storage' and UnitOfMeasure LIKE '%GB/Month'
GROUP by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterSubCategory, UnitOfMeasure
ORDER by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), sum(Cost) DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) AS [Date],
    MeterName,
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) AS ConsumedQuantity
    --UnitOfMeasure
    --*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
--WHERE MeterCategory = 'Storage' AND ServiceTier = 'Tables' and Product NOT LIKE '%Operations%'
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Storage' AND (MeterName LIKE '%Data Stored' or MeterName LIKE '%Index')
--WHERE MeterName LIKE 'Data Stored' 
GROUP BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterName
order by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterName

-- This is auto-generated code

    ServiceInfo2,

    sum(Quantity) as Quantity,
    max(UnitOfMeasure),

WHERE (ResourceId like '%/virtualMachines/%' or ResourceId like '%/virtualMachineScaleSets/%') and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines'

    --and MeterSubCategory = 'Dv3/DSv3 Series Windows'
    --and ReservationName != ''

    and (MeterSubCategory like '%Windows%' and ServiceInfo2 is NULL) or (ServiceInfo2 = 'Windows Server BYOL')
    --and (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory = 'Windows Server')
    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/fa020411-3a3b-443d-8b2f-ed3ac1a4029c/resourceGroups/S230-DC-FORECAST-CLIENT/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets/vmss-dc-forecast-client'
    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/5f9dec8c-8bfd-40e1-b7c7-85fa538f77ed/resourceGroups/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/MMP-TS4212'
    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/a6abe45d-e638-4325-a7e9-5559450aa434/resourceGroups/INFPROD-NOW/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/WS4253'
    and [Date] = '2023-01-10'
    group by ResourceId, [Date], ServiceInfo2
    order by [Date]
    --order by JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') DESC

USE costmgmt
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW Combined_Actual_Savings
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where [Date] >= '2022-12-31'

UNION --ALL

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/ACMDailyActualCost.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where [Date] <= '2022-12-31'

folder.name: Ad Hoc Cost Report Requests/Cloud Cost Facts

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --top 100 *
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,upper(MeterSubCategory) as [VM Series]
    ,FORMAT(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
    --,Quantity
    --,format(sum(Quantity), 'N', 'en-us') as Quantity
    --,UnitOfMeasure
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/2023*/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_2023*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines'
    group BY upper(MeterSubCategory), format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    order by [Date], sum(CostInBillingCurrency) DESC

SELECT
    --TOP 1000 *
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as VCPUs, 
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date], 
    sum(Quantity) as Quantity,
    PartNumber,
    ProductName,
    MeterCategory,
    ServiceInfo2
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/2022*/A*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ServiceInfo2 = 'Windows Server BYOL' --and ReservationName != '' and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), PartNumber, ProductName, MeterCategory, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs'), ServiceInfo2
ORDER BY format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), sum(Quantity) DESC

SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as VCPUs, 
    substring([Date],0,8) as [Date], 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    PartNumber,
    Product,
    ServiceInfo2
    --,sum(Cost) as Cost
    --TOP 1000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/monthly/2022/*/*-cleaned.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
--WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses'
----Filtering on only Windows Server HUB VM's, there is also Windows Client BYOL but this is not relecant for VM HUB savings calculations
----I've removed "Product LIKE '%Spot%'" part is not required as spot machine still come under "MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines'"
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE 'Windows Server BYOL'
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring([Date],0,8), PartNumber, Product, ServiceInfo2, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs')
ORDER BY substring([Date],0,8), ConsumedQuantity DESC

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --top 100 *
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,upper(MeterSubCategory) as [VM Series]
    --,FORMAT(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
    --,Quantity
    ,format(sum(Quantity), 'N', 'en-us') as Quantity
    --,UnitOfMeasure
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/2023*/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_2023*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines'
    group BY upper(MeterSubCategory), format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    order by [Date], sum(Quantity) DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationOrderId') as ReservationOrderId, 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    sum(Cost) as Cost,
    Product
    --TOP 1000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' --and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationId') LIKE '%%' --and Product Not like 'Windows%'
--and MeterSubCategory = 'Reservation-Base VM' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE '%BYOL' and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationOrderId'), Product
ORDER BY ServiceType

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    ReservationId
    ,ReservationName
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,Term
    ,[Date]
    ,Quantity
    ,CostInBillingCurrency
    
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/2022*/A*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where ChargeType = 'Purchase' and PricingModel = 'Reservation' --and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ChargeType = 'Usage'
--group by ReservationName, format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') 
--order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), ReservationName

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    --ReservationId
    --,ReservationName
    --,MeterSubCategory
    --,Term
    --,[Date]
    sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
    
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/202303*/A*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where 
    ChargeType = 'Purchase' 
    and PricingModel = 'Reservation' 
    and (ReservationName like 'S037_%' OR ReservationName like 'VM_RI_%')
    --and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ChargeType = 'Usage'
--group by ReservationName, format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') 
--order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), ReservationName

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    ReservationId
    ,ReservationName
    ,SubscriptionName
    ,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,Term
    ,ChargeType
    ,Quantity
    ,UnitPrice
    ,CostInBillingCurrency
    
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/2022*/A*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where ChargeType = 'Purchase' and PricingModel = 'Reservation' and MeterCategory not like '%SQL%' --and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ChargeType = 'Usage'
--group by ReservationName, format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') 
order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), ReservationName

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    --,format([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    --,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
    --avg(UnitPrice) as UnitPrice
    --,EffectivePrice as EffectivePrice
    --,sum(UnitPrice * Quantity) as [PAYG Cost]
    --,sum(EffectivePrice * Quantity) as [RI Cost]
    --,sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as TotalUsedSavings
    sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity 
    ,[Date]
    --,ReservationName
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/202303*/A*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where 
    ChargeType = 'Refund' 
    and PricingModel = 'Reservation' 
    and (ReservationName like 'S037_%' OR ReservationName like 'VM_RI_%')

    --and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ChargeType = 'Usage'
--group by ReservationName, format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') 
--order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), ReservationName
group by [Date] --, ReservationName
order by [Date]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 10 *
    ReservationName
    ,format([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
    ,avg(UnitPrice) as UnitPrice
    ,avg(EffectivePrice) as EffectivePrice
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,sum(UnitPrice * Quantity) as [Equinor PAYG Cost]
    ,sum(EffectivePrice * Quantity) as [RI Cost]
    ,sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as TotalUsedSavings
    ,ProductOrderName
    ,PartNumber
    ,ChargeType
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAm*/2022*/A*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where ChargeType = 'Usage' and PricingModel = 'Reservation' and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' --and format([Date],'yyyy-MM') = '2022-12'
group by ReservationName, format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'),ProductOrderName,PartNumber, ChargeType
order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), ReservationName

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 *
    --[Date]
    sum([PAYG Cost]) as [PAYG Cost]
    ,sum([RI Cost]) as [RI Cost]
    ,sum(TotalUsedSavings) as TotalUsedSavings
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/test/RI_Savings_2022/VM_RI_Usage_2022.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    --group by [Date]
    --order by [Date]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    reservationOrderId AS reservationOrderId,
    reservationOrderName AS reservationOrderName,
    armSkuName AS armSkuName,
    term AS term,
    substring(FORMAT (eventDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,11) AS eventDate,
    quantity AS quantity,
    amount AS amount,
    currency,
    billingFrequency AS billingFrequency
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/annual/2021/costreport_reservations_monthly_2021.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
--where reservationOrderId = '7334aae9-5adc-4e4c-a58b-801d095a14df'
where reservationOrderName NOT LIKE '%SQL%' and reservationOrderId != 'd5b99270-d26e-49b1-82dc-d7cb16a9181a' and reservationOrderName NOT LIKE '%SUSE%'
order by substring(FORMAT (eventDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,11)

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    reservationOrderId AS reservationOrderId,
    reservationOrderName AS reservationOrderName,
    armSkuName AS armSkuName,
    term AS term,
    substring(eventDate,0,11) AS eventDate,
    quantity AS quantity,
    amount AS amount,
    currency,
    billingFrequency AS billingFrequency
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/reservations/2022/reservations_costreport.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
--where reservationOrderId = '7334aae9-5adc-4e4c-a58b-801d095a14df'
--where reservationOrderName NOT LIKE '%SQL%' --and reservationOrderId != 'd5b99270-d26e-49b1-82dc-d7cb16a9181a'
where armSkuName NOT LIKE 'SQL%' and eventDate Like '2022%'
order by substring(eventDate,0,11)

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType,
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date],
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    MeterSubCategory
    --*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and MeterSubCategory = 'Reservation-Base VM' --and (MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Windows%')
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterSubCategory
ORDER BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), ConsumedQuantity DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    MeterCategory,
    MeterName,
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date],
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    sum(Cost) as Cost
    --UnitOfMeasure
    --*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' or MeterCategory = 'Cloud Services'
GROUP BY MeterCategory, MeterName, substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8)--, UnitOfMeasure
ORDER BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterCategory

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    --MeterCategory
    --,MeterSubCategory
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,count(DISTINCT ResourceId) as [Count]
    --,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    --,AdditionalInfo

    --,UnitOfMeasure

    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2022*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines'

-- This is auto-generated code

    [MeterSubCategory],

    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',

        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',

order by Cost DESC

-- This is auto-generated code

    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date], 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity
    --Product
    --ConsumedQuantity, 
    --sum(ConsumedQuantity), REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING(AdditionalInfo,CHARINDEX('Standard_',AdditionalInfo)+11,2),'_',''),'s','')
    --ConsumedQuantity, substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING(AdditionalInfo,CHARINDEX('Standard_',AdditionalInfo)+10,3),'_',''),'s',''),'S','')
    --MeterName, ConsumedQuantity, substring(FORMAT ([Date],'YYYY-MM-DD') ,6,2), AdditionalInfo

    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',

        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',

--and (MeterSubCategory NOT LIKE '%Windows%' and ServiceInfo2 Not Like '%Windows%')

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationOrderId') as ReservationOrderId,

    SubscriptionName,
    ServiceInfo2
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/monthly/2022/*/*-cleaned.parquet',

    ) AS [result]
WHERE (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and MeterSubCategory = 'Reservation-Base VM') --and ([Date] >= '2022-01-01' and [Date] < '2022-07-01')
--and (MeterSubCategory NOT LIKE '%Windows%' and ServiceInfo2 Not Like '%Windows%')
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring([Date],0,8), SubscriptionName, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationOrderId'), ServiceInfo2
ORDER BY substring([Date],0,8), sum(ConsumedQuantity) DESC

USE costmgmt;
GO

SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationOrderId') as ReservationOrderId, 
    substring([Date],0,8) as [Date], 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    SubscriptionName
FROM usage
WHERE (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and MeterSubCategory = 'Reservation-Base VM') and ([Date] >= '2022-01-01' and [Date] < '2022-07-01')
--and (MeterSubCategory NOT LIKE '%Windows%' and ServiceInfo2 Not Like '%Windows%')
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring([Date],0,8), SubscriptionName, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationOrderId')
ORDER BY substring([Date],0,8), sum(ConsumedQuantity) DESC

-- Create the Calendar table
CREATE TABLE Calendar
(
    [Date] DATE,
    [Year] INT,
    [Month] INT,
    [Day] INT,
    [Quarter] INT,
    [DayOfWeek] INT,
    [Weekday] INT,
    [WeekOfYear] INT,
    [MonthName] NVARCHAR(20),
    [DayName] NVARCHAR(20),
    [IsHoliday] INT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN
);

-- Create the clustered columnstore index
CREATE CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX idx_Columnstore ON Calendar;

-- Optional: Create additional indexes or constraints if needed
-- CREATE INDEX idx_Date ON dbo.Calendar([Date]);
-- ALTER TABLE dbo.Calendar ADD CONSTRAINT pk_Calendar PRIMARY KEY ([Date]);

-- Create the Calendar table using CTAS
CREATE TABLE Calendar
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
AS
SELECT
    [Date],
    YEAR([Date]) AS [Year],
    MONTH([Date]) AS [Month],
    DAY([Date]) AS [Day],
    DATEPART(QUARTER, [Date]) AS [Quarter],
    DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) AS [DayOfWeek],
    CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) IN (1, 7) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS [Weekday],
    DATEPART(WEEK, [Date]) AS [WeekOfYear],
    DATENAME(MONTH, [Date]) AS [MonthName],
    DATENAME(WEEKDAY, [Date]) AS [DayName],
    0 AS [IsHoliday] -- Set IsHoliday value based on your specific requirements
FROM
    (SELECT CAST('2000-01-01' AS DATE) AS [Date] UNION ALL SELECT DATEADD(DAY, 1, [Date]) FROM dbo.Calendar WHERE [Date] < '2030-12-31') AS c
OPTION (LABEL = 'Create Calendar', SINGLE_BLOB);

source:
amortizedCostPath = 'exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/'
actualCostPath = 'exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/'
toDate = '20230131'
fromDate = '20230101'
container = 'usage'
months = ['02']
years = ['2023']
storageAccount = 's037costmgmt'

import pandas as pd
import json
import numpy as np
from datetime import datetime
import calendar
import warnings

def load_source_files(path, subscription_path, appListPath):
    
    print(f'Loading Source Parquet file - {path}...')
    cost_df = pd.read_parquet(path)
    print(f'Loading Subscription list - {subscription_path}...')
    subscription_list = pd.read_json(subscription_path)
    print(f'Loading SNOW application list - {appListPath}...')
    appList = pd.read_parquet(appListPath)

    #cost_df.dropna(subset=['AdditionalInfo'], inplace=True)
    #cost_df = cost_df.head(10000)

    return cost_df, subscription_list, appList

def populate_columns(cost_df):

    # Populating the Azure Hynbrid Benefit Column
    cost_df['Azure_Hybrid_Benefit'] = np.where(cost_df['MeterSubCategory'].str.contains("Windows"), "Not enabled", np.where(cost_df['ServiceInfo2'] == "Windows Server BYOL", "Enabled", "Not supported"))

    # Populating the isRIUsage Column
    cost_df['IsRIUsage'] = np.where(cost_df['ReservationId'].isna(), "On Demand Usage", "RI Usage")

    # Extend AdditionalInfo Column
    print('Calculating Mask....')
    mask = cost_df['AdditionalInfo'].notna()
    cost_df.loc[mask, 'AdditionalInfo'] = cost_df.loc[mask, 'AdditionalInfo'].apply(json.loads)
    

    return cost_df

def extend_additional_info(cost_df):
    
    print('Expanding the AdditionalInfo column...')
    #cost_df = pd.concat([cost_df, cost_df.pop('AdditionalInfo').apply(pd.Series).add_prefix('ai_')], axis=1)
    AdditionalInfo_df = cost_df.pop('AdditionalInfo').apply(pd.Series).add_prefix('ai_')
    #AdditionalInfo_df = AdditionalInfo_df[["ai_UsageType", "ai_ImageType", "ai_ServiceType", "ai_VMName", "ai_VMProperties", "ai_VCPUs", "ai_AHB", "ai_vCores", "ai_RINormalizationRatio", "ai_ConsumedQuantity", "ai_DatabaseName"]]
    columns_to_keep = ["ai_UsageType", "ai_ImageType", "ai_ServiceType", "ai_VMName", "ai_VMProperties", "ai_VCPUs", "ai_AHB", "ai_vCores", "ai_RINormalizationRatio", "ai_ConsumedQuantity", "ai_DatabaseName"]
    AdditionalInfo_df.drop(AdditionalInfo_df.columns.difference(columns_to_keep), axis=1, inplace=True)

    # Manually creating the columns in the columns_to_keep array encase any columns are not present in the AdditionalInfo column.
    # This avoids schema conflict with the usage file for other months that may have the missing columns
    cost_df[columns_to_keep] = len(columns_to_keep) * [np.nan]
    
    # Updating the 'columns_to_keep' columns in cost_df with the values from AdditionalInfo_df
    AdditionalInfo_df.dropna(inplace=True, how='all')
    cost_df.update(AdditionalInfo_df)
  

    return cost_df

def AHB_column(cost_df):
    
    print('Populating the AHB vCPUs column...')
    cost_df['ai_VCPUs'] = cost_df['ai_VCPUs'].fillna(0)
    cost_df['ai_VCPUs'] = cost_df['ai_VCPUs'].astype(int)
    cost_df['AHB_vCPUs'] = np.where(cost_df['ai_VCPUs'] == 0, 0, 
        np.where(cost_df['ai_VCPUs'] < 8, 8, 
        np.where(cost_df['ai_VCPUs'] <= 16, 16,
        np.where(cost_df['ai_VCPUs'] == 20, 24,
        np.where(cost_df['ai_VCPUs'] > 20, cost_df['ai_VCPUs'], 0)))))

    return cost_df

def instance_name(cost_df):    
    
    print('Populating the Instance Name column...')
    cost_df.rename({'ai_VmName':'ai_Container_VmName'}, axis=1, inplace=True)
    cost_df['Instance_Name'] = np.where(cost_df['ai_VMName'].isna(), cost_df['ResourceName'],
        np.where(cost_df['ai_VMName'].notna(), cost_df['ai_VMName'], pd.NA))

    cost_df['Date'] = cost_df['Date'].dt.date
    
    return cost_df

def expand_subscription_tags(subscription_list):

    print('Expanding the SubscriptionWBS and SubscriptionServiceNow-App fields from the subscription list Tags field into their own fields...')

    try:
        subscription_tags_df = subscription_list.pop('tags').apply(pd.Series)
    except:
        print('Error processing the subscriptions json file!')

    subscription_list['SubscriptionWBS'] = subscription_tags_df['WBS']
    subscription_list['SubscriptionServiceNow-App'] = subscription_tags_df['ServiceNow-App']
    
    subscription_list.rename(columns={"id": "SubscriptionId"}, inplace=True)
    columns_to_keep = ['SubscriptionId', 'SubscriptionWBS', 'SubscriptionServiceNow-App']

    subscription_list.drop(columns=subscription_list.columns.difference(columns_to_keep), inplace=True)
    
    return subscription_list

def merge_dataframes(cost_df, subscription_list):

    print('Merging the SubscriptionWBS and SubscriptionServiceNow-App fields from the subscription list into the cost dataframe...')

    #cost_df['SubscriptionWBS'] = subscription_list(subscription_list.index, cost_df['SubscriptionId'])
    
    #print(subscription_list.columns)
    #print(subscription_list[list('SubscriptionId')])
    #cost_df = pd.merge(left=cost_df, right=subscription_list, left_on='SubscriptionId', right_on='id', how='left')
    print(len(cost_df))
    print(f"cost_df Cost total is: {cost_df['CostInBillingCurrency'].sum()}")
    cost_df = cost_df.merge(subscription_list, how='left', on='SubscriptionId')

    #print(cost_df[cost_df['ActiveWBS'].isnull()])

def replace_empty_cost_fields_with_subscription_details(cost_df, subscription_list, appList):

    print("Creating ActiveWBS column, copying over CostAllocationCode, replacing 'TOBESPECIFIED' and empty values then filling gaps with SubscriptionWBS...")

    cost_df['CostAllocationCode'].replace('', np.nan, inplace=True)
    cost_df['CostAllocationType'].replace('', np.nan, inplace=True)
    cost_df['ActiveWBS'] = cost_df.loc[cost_df['CostAllocationType'] == 'WBS', 'CostAllocationCode']

    mask = (cost_df['CostAllocationType'] != "WBS") & (cost_df['CostAllocationType'] != "APPID") & (cost_df['CostAllocationType'] != "CI") & (cost_df['CostAllocationType'] != "SubscriptionWBS")
    cost_df.loc[mask, ['ActiveWBSReason']] = 'Invalid CostAllocationType: not APPID, CI or WBS'

    mask = (cost_df['CostAllocationCode'].str.contains('^[a-zA-Z]\.\S*', regex=True) == False) & (cost_df['CostAllocationType'] == 'WBS')
    cost_df.loc[mask, 'ActiveWBS'] = cost_df.loc[mask, 'SubscriptionWBS']
    cost_df.loc[mask, 'CostAllocationType'] = 'SubscriptionWBS'
    cost_df.loc[mask, 'ActiveWBSReason'] = 'Invalid CostAllocationCode WBS'
    
    appList = appList.astype({'u_number': 'str'})
    cost_df['ActiveWBS'] = cost_df['ActiveWBS'].fillna(cost_df['CostAllocationCode'].map(appList.set_index('u_number')['u_operational_wbs']))
    cost_df['ActiveWBS'] = cost_df['ActiveWBS'].fillna(cost_df['CostAllocationCode'].map(appList.set_index('name')['u_operational_wbs']))
    cost_df['ActiveWBS'].replace('TOBESPECIFIED', np.nan, inplace=True)  
    
    cost_df.loc[cost_df['CostAllocationType'].isnull(), 'CostAllocationCode'] = np.nan
    cost_df.loc[cost_df['CostAllocationType'].isnull(), 'CostAllocationType'] = 'SubscriptionWBS'
    cost_df.loc[cost_df['ActiveWBS'].isnull(), 'ActiveWBS'] = cost_df['SubscriptionWBS']
    
    cost_df.loc[cost_df['CostAllocationType'].isnull(), 'CostAllocationType'] = 'SubscriptionWBS'

    mask = (cost_df['CostAllocationType'] == 'CI')
    cost_df.loc[mask, 'ActiveWBSReason'] = 'CI WBS Lookup from SNOW'

    mask = (cost_df['CostAllocationType'] == 'APPID')
    cost_df.loc[mask, 'ActiveWBSReason'] = 'APPID WBS Lookup from SNOW'

    mask = (cost_df['CostAllocationType'] == 'WBS')
    cost_df.loc[mask, 'ActiveWBSReason'] = 'WBS Cost Tag used'

    mask = (cost_df['Tags'].str.contains('CostAllocationCode', case=False, na=False) == False) | (cost_df['Tags'].str.contains('CostAllocationType', case=False, na=False) == False)
    cost_df.loc[mask, 'ActiveWBSReason'] = 'CostAllocationType or CostAllocationCode not present in Tags'

    return cost_df, subscription_list
